abstract: Update | 5:55 p.m. Lawyers said in a court hearing on Tuesday that Bernard L. Madoff, the disgraced financier accused of running the largest Ponzi scheme in history, would plead guilty to charges that would result in a life sentence.

headline.main: Madoff to Plead Guilty to Vast Fraud
